profile_summary: Embedded DSP engineer with 11 years in real-time audio/signal systems. Specializes in real-time pipelines, fixed-point DSP, and bare-metal performance tuning.

experience.title: Embedded DSP Engineer, AudioCore GmbH; Hamburg, Germany — 2016–Present
experience.summary: Developed real-time filters and echo cancellation pipelines on TI DSPs. Optimized fixed-point operations to reduce latency by 30%.

experience.title: Firmware Developer, SoundLogic AG; Kiel, Germany — 2012–2016
experience.summary: Ported audio codec stacks to embedded platforms. Designed I2S/SPI-based streaming drivers.

experience.title: Embedded Audio Engineer, AcouSys UG; Lübeck, Germany — 2010–2012
experience.summary: Built RTOS scheduling framework for multi-band compression and EQ in wearable devices.
